sentences.sContent: The new airport will facilitate the development of tourism.
sentences.sCn: 新机场将促进旅游业的发展。

sentences.sContent: ...When does the presence of an audience facilitate your performance according to Roberts...

words.tran: 简易化；[生理] 助长；容易

trans.tranOther: To facilitate an action or process, especially one that you would like to happen, means to make it easier or more likely to happen
